content:
{
  "name": "ts-path-mapping",
  "version": "0.1.4",
  "description": "Adds the path aliases declared in tsconfig.json using module-alias package.",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "prepare": "tsc",
    "test": "cls && mocha ./dist/**/*.test.js"
  },
  "author": "sleep-written",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/sleep-written/ts-path-mapping"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "README.md"
  ],
  "exports": {
    ".": "./dist/index.js",
    "./register": "./dist/register/index.js"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "typescript",
    "path",
    "node",
    "resolve",
    "mapping",
    "path-mapping",
    "alias",
    "module-alias",
    "extend",
    "modules"
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/chai": "^4.2.20",
    "@types/mocha": "^8.2.3",
    "@types/module-alias": "^2.0.0",
    "@types/node": "^16.0.1",
    "chai": "^4.3.4",
    "mocha": "^9.0.2",
    "typescript": "^4.3.5"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "comment-json": "^4.1.0",
    "module-alias": "^2.2.2"
  }
}
